products.title: Faux Silk, Silver - Roman Blind
products.description: It doesn't get more glamorous than the faux silk silver, with its ebony shading and satin-smooth fabric. Raised stitching flecks the cloth, adding texture and flair to this sophisticated roman blind. The silver will hang almost anywhere in the home, whether amongst white walls with mid-grey and silver highlights for a monochromatic scheme in the dining room, with zesty citrus shades for a bright and energising look in the kitchen, or amid pale pastels to add a modern but calming touch to a teenager's bedroom.

products.title: Tuileries Spring Roman Blind
products.description: Tuileries is a range of beautiful floral patterned blinds, available in 3 natural soft colours. Product id: db-rom0846 fabric colour: spring material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.
